name: Peitto
description:
"In Finnish folklore metsänpeitto (forest's cover) was a place or a phenomenon where people or domestic animals went missing.  It has been described as an unfamiliar terrain without natural sounds, as a place totally strange".

How to play: Arrows/WASD to move, Mouse to navigate, Space to jump.

During a lovely walk in the nearby forest, your dog broke free and ran off deeper into the woods! The forest can be a scary place, but I know you would do anything for your best friend. So let's get her back!

Credits:
FearJudge - Coding, game design
Maria Kaya - Level design, music/sound
Taisto Saromäki - 3D, level design
Satu Anttila - Art

Some asset packs were used. 
No animals were harmed during the project (our coder was and we are very sorry about that).

This is a Finnish College Jam project, little demo which we created in four days.

If you have any thoughts or questions about this game, leave us a message. We would appreciate that, thank you!
